Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Finisher - Reinforce
  • Surging Adrenaline
  • Beyond-er Blade, Beyond Blade Barrage and Piercing Beyond Blade

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Aran Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

extraContent.title: Combo Count System
extraContent.content:
In 2nd Job, Aran unlocks a resource called Combo count from Combo Ability that is gained automatically and upon successful direct attack skills

In 3rd Job, upon reaching 1000 Combo, using Adrenaline Rush Activate will temporarily enter Adrenaline Rush Mode that creates a continuously damaging zone around the character

In 4th Job, Finisher-type skills are unlocked like Finsher - Hunter's Prey that can be used during Adrenaline Rush. As well, a new mode can be activated during Adrenaline Rush by also using called Adrenal Awakening that grants access to the Hyper Finisher skill called Last Stand

Certain skills can be activated through Key Inputs or assigned to a Key Slot. The following skills can be activated using Key Inputs:

  • Combat Step (Beginner) → + → / Jump + Jump
  • Final Charge (1st Job) ↓ + → + Attack / ↓ + ← + Attack
  • Final Toss (1st Job) ↑ + Attack
  • Permafrost (3rd Job) ↓ + Attack
  • Judgment Draw (3rd Job) ↑ + → + Attack / ↑ + ← + Attack
  • Glacial Prison (4th Job) ↑ + ↓ + Attack
  • Maha's Carnage (5th Job) ↓ + ↓ + Attack

The following skills can only be activated during Adrenaline Rush / Adrenal Awakening (once per activation)

  • Finisher - Hunter's Prey (4th Job) ↓ + (→ or ←) + ↓ + Attack (Hold)
  • Finisher - Adrenaline Surge (5th Job) ↑ + ↑ + Attack

Key Input activation can be disabled for the skills above by right-clicking the skill

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Agile Body
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Regained Memory
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase Attack Power: +5%, DEF: +300
details: Gained from completing Arkarium storyline/pre-quests

primary.name: Combat Step
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, travel a short distance\nMovement Speed +25, Max Movement Speed +20
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed and Max Movement Speed
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice or pressing the Forward Arrow Key twice
If used on the ground, you will dash forward
If used in the air, you will perform a double jump
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from cancelling with the Arrow Keys

primary.name: Return to Rien
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, return to Rien.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest 'Weapon Acknowledges Its Owner'
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Smash Swing
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Swing forward consecutively up to three times
details: Prevents falling when used while jumping

primary.name: Final Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nWhile using Beyond Blade, Cooldown: 3 sec.
primary.desc: Dash forward and push enemies back
details: Can be used while casting but has a cooldown
[Command] ↓ + → + Attack / ↓ + ← + Attack

primary.name: Final Toss
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 200% while lifting enemies into the air
primary.desc: Leap into the air while lifting enemies
details:
[Command] ↑ + Attack
  • Command version increases jump height
Can be used twice

primary.name: Ol' Reliable
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +200, Attack Power: +20, Critical Rate: +10%

primary.name: Agile Polearms
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, STR: +20

primary.name: Combo Ability
primary.shortDesc: Increase your Combo Count by the number of direct skill attacks you land. When your combo is at least 1, you'll obtain 20 combos every 5 seconds. Your Attack Power increases by 2 and your Movement Speed increases by 3 for every 50 combo stacks.\nThe Attack Power and Movement Speed increase effect can stack up to 10 times.\n[Passive Effect: Critical Rate: +20%, Knockback Resistance: +50%]
primary.desc: Combo stacks increase automatically over time and from successful direct attack skills
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Crit Rate and %Knockback Resistance
Increases Attack and Movement Speed based on the number of Combo stacks currently active

primary.name: Beyond Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 5, Damage: 115%\nCritical Hit Rate: +30%
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate

primary.name: Drain
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, recovers 1% of Max HP when landing direct skill attacks.\n[Passive Effect: Max HP +10%]

primary.name: Snow Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Enemy Speed: -40 for 20 sec, Damage: +10% when landing direct skill attacks on enemies that have had their speed reduced. When used against bosses, the speed reduction effect and duration is cut in half.\n[Passive Effects - Damage: +15%]
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage
Successful direct attack skills against slowed enemies deal increased %Damage
Bosses receive half the effect and duration of the slow

primary.name: Polearm Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Polearm Mastery: +50%, Attack Speed +1, Final Damage: +10%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal 150% additional damage
primary.desc: Successful direct attack skills have a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Advanced Combo Ability
primary.shortDesc: The Combo Ability effect is always applied at its maximum value\nAttack Power: +10, Status Resistance: +40, Critical Damage: +10%
details: Permanently applies the maximum stack effects from
Now grants flat Attack and increases Abnormal Status Resistance, and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Permafrost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Duration: 60 sec\nPeriodically deals 250% damage 4 times to up to 6 enemies.\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Summon a stationary polearm that damages nearby enemies
details: [Command] ↓ + Attack
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Judgment Draw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 27, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Slam forward launching enemies in the air
details: [Command] ↑ + → + Attack / ↑ + ← + Attack

primary.name: Maha Blessing
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13, Attack Power: +30, Magic ATT: +30, Duration: 200 sec

primary.name: Adrenaline Rush
primary.shortDesc: After reaching 1,000 Combos, use Adrenaline Rush Activate to enter Adrenaline Rush for 15 seconds.\n Iceflow: Activates during Adrenaline Rush, attacks up to 7 enemies with 350% damage 2 times.
primary.desc: At 1000 Combo stack, use to enter Adrenaline Rush that grants Iceflow that continuously damages enemies around the character
details: Unaffected by %Buff Duration

primary.name: Adrenaline Rush Activate
primary.shortDesc:
Available upon reaching 1,000 combos.
Once Adrenaline Rush ends, you'll earn back combos based on the number of direct skill attacks landed while Adrenaline Rush was active.
Earn back 30%, 60%, or 100% of 500 combos for every 8 attacks landed
Cooldown: 90 sec
primary.desc: At 1000 Combo stack, using this skill will activate Adrenaline state
details: Shares Skill Points (SP) with
After Adrenaline Rush ends, Combo stacks are reset but can be refunded based on the number of successful direct attack skills while Adrenaline Rush was active

In 4th Job, pressing the Skill Key again during Adrenaline Rush after 10 successful attacks will activate Adrenal Awakening
  • When activating Adrenaline Rush, if the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key is pressed together, once the requirement to activate Adrenal Awakening is met, it will automatically activate
  • Right-clicking the skill will also toggle ON/OFF the function to automatically activate Adrenal Awakening once the requirement is met

primary.name: Beyond Blade Mastery I
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 25, Max Enemies Hit: 6
Press the skill key to attack consecutively up to two more times.
Beyond Blade - Black Tortoise: Deal 205% damage 5 times.
Beyond Blade - Vermillion Bird: Deal 205% damage 5 times.
Critical Rate: +60%
details: Adds an additional attack by pressing the Skill Key two times
Attack now grants knockback immunity while casting (Super Knockback Resistance)
Increases %Damage and %Crit Rate of attack

primary.name: Might
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +40, DEF: +215, Critical Rate: +20%, Boss Damage: +15%\nDamage required to knock back a monster decreased to 10%.

primary.name: High Defense
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -40%\nHP: +20%, DEF: +300, Knockback Resistance: +50%

primary.name: Adrenaline Overload
primary.shortDesc:
Activate Adrenaline Awakening by landing 10 attacks while Adrenaline Rush is active.
Adrenaline Awakening: lasts 5 seconds, enables Hyper Finisher skills, activates Golden Burst every 1.2 seconds when using direct skill attacks.
Golden Burst: Deals 650% damage 10 times to up to 12 enemies.
Cooldown: 180 seconds, Adrenal Awakening cooldown displays via the border of Adrenaline Rush Activate
[Passive Effect: Damage dealt by Iceflow: +320%p]
primary.desc: During , grants Adrenal Awakening after 10 successful direct attack skills by pressing
details: During Adrenal Awakening, grants the use of 'Hyper Finisher' skills and Golden Burst that activates to deal damage when using direct attack skills
Cooldown of Adrenal Awakening is displayed through a border outline on
Also permanently increases the %Damage of by a flat amount
Unaffected by %Buff Duration

primary.name: Finisher - Hunter's Prey
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, can hold down the key for up to 6 seconds, become invincible for 2 seconds after releasing the key.\nDamage: 790%, Number of Attacks: 15, Chase Cut Activation Count: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 10\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Charge forward for a powerful blow
details: While held, become invincible while charging and shortly after releasing
While held, the direction of the attack can be changed by pressing the Left or Right Arrow Keys
Can only be used one-time after activating or
[Command] ↓ + (→ or ←) + ↓ + Attack (Hold)

primary.name: Glacial Prison
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 110, Max Enemies Hit 12, Damage: 480%, Number of Attacks: 8
Stun Duration: 10 sec.
Stun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Glacial Prison.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
details: [Command] ↑ + ↓ + Attack

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Beyond Blade Mastery II
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 6
Press the skill key to attack consecutively up to three more times.
Beyond Blade - Black Tortoise: Deal 410% damage 5 times.
Beyond Blade - Vermillion Bird: Deal 410% damage 5 times.

Beyond Blade - Azure Dragon: Deal 410%  damage 5 times.
Critical Rate: +100%, Ignore Defense: 30%
details: Adds an additional attack by pressing the Skill Key three times
Attack now is a guaranteed Critical Hit and has increase %Ignore DEF
Attack grants knockback immunity while casting (Super Knockback Resistance)
Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: High Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Polearm Mastery: +70%\nAttack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +10%, Final Damage: +21%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage and %Final Damage

primary.name: Sudden Strike
primary.shortDesc: Damage dealt by Final Charge, Final Toss, and Judgment Draw: +140%p\nDamage dealt by Permafrost: +250%p\nDamage dealt by Smash Swing: +600%p
primary.desc: Increases %Damage by a flat amount for

primary.name: Cleaving Attack
primary.shortDesc: Ignore Defense: 40%, Damage: +35%

primary.name: Advanced Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30 permanently.\n[Final Attack Skills] 60% chance to deal an additional 180% damage 3 times.
details: Increases activation chance, %Damage, and number of hits
Now additionally grants flat Attack

hyperPassive.name: Finisher - Reinforce
details: Applies to both Finisher and Hyper Finisher skills

hyperPassive.name: Finisher - Guardbreak
details: Applies to both Finisher and Hyper Finisher skills

details: Applies to and

details: Applies to and

details: Applies to and

hyperActive.name: Maha's Blessing
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Invincibility Duration: 2 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec

hyperActive.name: Hyper Finisher - Last Stand
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, attack up to 3 times by tapping the skill key
Hit 1 - Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1600%, Number of Attacks: 10, Chase Cuts: 5
Hit 2 - Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1600%, Number of Attacks: 10, Chase Cuts: 5
Hit 3 - Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 2800%, Number of Attacks: 13, Chase Cuts: 7
Cooldown: 30 sec
hyperActive.desc: Swing forward dealing a devastating attack
details: Can be used three times in a row
Can only be used one-time after activating

hyperActive.name: Heroic Memories
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to hero classes in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Finisher - Adrenaline Surge
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, giant blizzard lasts 6 seconds
Adrenaline Rush State: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1320%, Number of continuous Attacks: 14
Adrenal Awakening State: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1430%, Number of continuous Attacks: 14
Cooldown: 30 sec
[Passive Effect: Adrenal Awakening duration: +5 seconds]
fifthMain.desc: Summon a polearm that continuously damages enemies within the zone
details: [Command] ↑ + ↑ + Attack
[Passive]: Permanently increases the duration of

Can only be used one-time after activating or
  • Attack deals increased damage when used during
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Maha's Carnage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1210%, Number of Attacks: 12, Chase Cut Activation Count: 4, Boss Damage: +20%\nCooldown: 20 sec\nCooldown reduced by 50% when Adrenaline Rush and Adrenal Awakening are not active.
details: [Command] ↓ + ↓ + Attack
Attack has increased %Boss Damage and grants knockback immunity (Super Knockback Resistance)
Cooldown is reduced by half when or is not active
Unaffected by Damage Reduction and Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Final Beyond Blade - White Tiger
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 815%, Number of Attacks: 7\nCritical Rate: +100%, Ignore Defense: +50%
details: Adds an additional attack by pressing the Skill Key four times
Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit and has increase %Ignore DEF
Attack grants knockback immunity while casting (Super Knockback Resistance)

fifthMain.name: Blizzard Tempest
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, using the skill increases combos to 200 and afflicts up to 10 enemies. Activates an aura for 30 sec after the attack, which periodically afflicts up to 5 enemies with the Dire Wolf's Curse.
Reusing the skill ends the it immediately
Dire Wolf's Curse: lasts 15 seconds, hitting afflicted enemies with direct skill attacks increases the duration up to 30 seconds, and ice shards appear for additional attacks. The curse can be stacked up to 6 times, increasing the ice shard attack count proportionally 1 times.
Ice Chunks: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1320%, Number of Attacks: 4, Cooldown: 0.4 sec
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: When used, grants 200 Combo stacks and an aura that debuffs enemies with Dire Wolf's Curse
details:
[Dire Wolf's Curse]: Successful direct attack skills deal an additional strike that damages nearby enemy
  • Successful attacks also increase the duration of the debuff and grants a stack (up to 6 times) that increases the number of ice shards created
Aura debuff prioritizes enemies with the highest Max HP first
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the skill early
Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF the ice chunk effect
Ignores Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Beyond Blade
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 52, Max Enemies Hit: 7
Press the skill key to attack consecutively up to three more times.
Beyond Blade - Black Tortoise: Deal 675% damage 5 times.
Beyond Blade - Vermillion Bird: Deal 675% damage 5 times.
Beyond Blade - Azure Dragon: Deal 675% damage 5 times.
Critical Rate: +100%, Ignore Defense: 30%
Maha appears every 4 seconds to deal an additional 630% damage 6 times to a maximum of 3 enemies.
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Finisher - Hunter's Prey
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 250, can hold down the key for up to 6 seconds, and become invincible for 2 seconds after releasing the key.
Damage: 1530%, Number of Attacks: 15, Chase Cut Activation Count: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 10
Cooldown: 30 sec
[Passive Effect: HEXA Beyond Blade Damage: +135%p]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Endgame
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Unleash all of Maha's power, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1500%, Number of Attacks: 14, Shockwaves: 50
Afterwards, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1620%, Number of Attacks: 15, Chase Cuts: 30.
Activates Adrenal Awakening for 15 seconds upon using the skill, or Adrenaline Rush if Adrenal Awakening is on cooldown.
Adrenal Awakening and Adrenaline Rush duration increases b y1 seconds for every 100 combos accumulated before using Endgame.
The duration of Adrenaline Rush and Adrenal Awakening changes to 5 seconds if Endgame is used while Adrenaline Rush or Adrenal Awakening are active.
Cooldown: 360 sec

notable.name: Hyper Finisher - Last Stand - Hyper Skill

meta: Aran is STR warrior class part of the Heroes class group. Aran utilize Polearms as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Aran can equip Masses
